course_name: Rural and Remote Nursing: High Acuity Practice
description: This course is designed to further develop the student's knowledge and management of specific health issues prevalent in rural and remote communities and the nursing approach required to provide care. The management of selectied high acuity health issues, including but not limited to, medical emergencies, chronic disease, palliative care, children's and Indigenous health will be explored. The legislative, legal and ethical constructs governing advanced nursing practice are also investigated along with professional and contemporary issues.
restricted: Graduate Certificate in Nursing, Graduate Diploma in Nursing, MN or MNPracSt students
